name: Moonlight Stalker Feint
description: You strike through the shadows so quickly that your opponent can barely react to your attacks.
prerequisites: Int 13, Blind-Fight, Combat Expertise, Improved Feint, Moonlight Stalker, Bluff 6 ranks, darkvision or low-light vision racial trait.
benefit: Once per round, against an opponent from whom you have concealment, you can spend a swift action to make a Bluff check to feint.
staminaText: When you attempt a Bluff check to feint against an opponent from whom you have concealment, you can spend up to 5 stamina points to gain a bonus on the Bluff check equal to double the number of stamina points you spent.
description_zh: 你的攻击自阴影中而来，对手全然无法反应。
prerequisites_zh: 智力13，盲斗，寓守于攻，精通虚招，月夜伏击者，唬骗6级，【黑暗视觉】或【昏暗视觉】种族特性。
benefit_zh:
每轮一次，当你对一个对手获得隐蔽，你可以用迅捷动作对其进行一次虚招。

通常状况：使用虚招是一个标准动作。
